title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I select a .java file and another resource (e.g. a .properties file) in the package viewer and open the context menu, there is no Team entry available.
EB: When I select a .java file and another resource in the package viewer and open the context menu, I expect to see the Team entry.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g. a .properties file) in the package viewer.
2. Open the context menu to verify that the Team entry is missing.
